text: Zamienice () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Chojnów, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. Zamienice It lies approximately north of Chojnów, north-west of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==Notable people== * Johann Wilhelm Ritter (1776-1810), chemist and physicist ==References== Category:Villages in Legnica County
title: Zamienice
